name: Satmojis
description: Satmojis is a CC0 collection of animated emojis inscribed directly onto Bitcoin via Ordinals. The first sticker-pack made for Ordinals. Extremely lean, 500 byte hand-drawn fine art GIFs which serve as a decentralized emoticon or reaction GIF library accessible permissionlessly via recursion. The supply is open ended, more generations will be added to the collection in the future. They are also indexed across all web2 apps via the artist, AKLO's verified GIPHY & TENOR accounts which power the gif libraries of Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Telegram, Discord & more. NYC based AKLO has been a verified GIF artist on GIPHY & Tenor since 2012 where he has over 200 Million views. Est. 2023 by PxPushers
